release_note: This release includes improvements for future Recap features. If you are part of a Recap Business workspace you can now view and edit files in that workspace. We have also added support for adding and managing team members in your business workspace and admins can now assign editor and viewer roles to their team. You can now have multiple people working in your Recap workspace in parallel both uploading media for transcriptions and allowing your editing staff to refine the machine generated transcriptions and translations as needed. If you would like to try our new business workspace features please fill out this survey and we will be in touch with you.

Enhanced Security and Privacy: The app now features screen blurring and biometric authentication for secure switching between apps ensuring users privacy and data protection. Expanded Transcription Language Support: The app now supports eight additional languages including Arabic Mauritania Kinyarwanda Rwanda Swati South Africa Southern Sotho South Africa Setswana South Africa Tsonga South Africa Venda South Africa and isiXhosa South Africa . Users from these regions can now enjoy advanced transcription capabilities in their native languages. Seamless Sign in Experience: Users can now sign in and sign up with ease using a secure one time password sent via email enhancing the overall login flow and simplifying the registration process. Reinstallation Issue Resolved: A bug has been fixed preventing users from remaining signed in after reinstalling the app. This ensures a smoother user experience and avoids potential security risks. Streamlined User Experience: Duplicate email verification has been removed simplifying the registration process.

Easily and securely sign up for or log in to Recap with just your email address! Avoid the hassle of yet another password and simply tap the link sent to your email to authenticate in the Recap app. Existing accounts can be accessed with an emailed login link or with their previously set password. New accounts will use the streamlined sign up flow exclusively. This release also brings the addition of 24 new languages available for translation. Recap enables translations of your video and audio content to reach a global audience now in 130 languages. Have a feature you like in Recap Let your friends on social media know about RecapEveryWord.

Automated translations have landed at Recap: Catch Every Word ! Translate transcripts and subtitles into 100 languages making them more accessible to a global audience. Start with 90 free minutes of translation credit. This release also improves SRT and VTT closed caption exports. Long paragraphs in most languages are now split into smaller segments. We hope the new translation features improve your transcription and captioning workflow. Tag us on social media RecapEveryWord.

Editing features have now landed at Recap: Catch Every Word ! You can tap on individual paragraphs of your transcripts to edit the text and export the polished transcript in a variety of formats. Edits in the transcript viewer are automatically included in your WebVTT and SRT closed caption file exports. Playback buttons are located conveniently next to each paragraph making it easy to quickly replay any audio segment and make any adjustments to the auto generated transcript. Other improvements to Recap: Catch Every Word in this release include: Enhanced password reset and security in email communications. Improvements in the paragraph level play restart button Major minor packages updates We hope the new editing features will help streamline your transcription and captioning workflow. Let us know how Recap is helping you to Catch Every Word by tagging us on social media RecapEveryWord.

Recap now supports transcribing video files! Give it a try and let us know how Recap is helping you to catch every word. Tip: transcribe voice memos and videos by sharing them from within the Voice Memos or Photos app and selecting Recap in the list of available apps.
We ve added some enhancements and fixes to make it even easier for you to sign up and transcribe files with Recap. We d love to hear from you about what s working well and what we can do better!
